summary: The conversation is between a customer (speaker_0) and a relationship manager (speaker_1) from Lending Club, a peer-to-peer lending platform. The customer had invested in the platform and the relationship manager is calling to address any doubts or concerns the customer might have.

- The customer wanted to understand the nature of the peer-to-peer lending platform, as it is "person to person" lending.
- The customer was concerned about the consequences if a borrower defaults on their repayment.
- The customer inquired if Lending Club provides any insurance coverage for such defaults.
questions_asked:
